LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays a confirm modal within a flow.

property.name: message
property.label: Message
property.description: The message to be displayed in the modal.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: Set to header (default) or headerless to control whether a header displays on the modal.

property.name: label
property.label: Header label
property.description: The label to be displayed in the header of the modal, if header variant is chosen. Deafults to confirm if not specified.

property.name: theme
property.label: Theme
property.description: The color theme of the header (https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/component-library/bundle/lightning-confirm/documentation)

property.name: navigateForwardOnConfirm
property.label: Forward on confirm
property.description: If true, the next or finish action will be triggered on clicking confirm, if available on the flow screen.

property.name: navigateBackOnCancel
property.label: Back on cancel
property.description: If true, the back action will be triggered on clicking cancel, if available on the flow screen.
